column4: how do i "reboot your computer and select the Linux kernel 3.0 entry on your GRUB boot loader."
explain what are you trying to do? There is no 3.0 kernel in current ubuntu version
yes it is, i am trying http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Install-Linux-Kernel-3-0-on-Ubuntu-11-04-217409.shtml
that kernel is from a PPA, those are not supported 3rd party repositories. Be very careful when using PPA's
